cards.title: Added
points: DronaHQ managed Remote Procedure Call (RPC) connector
SQLCURD Prepared statement support for bulk-insert action

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Manual push option added for git sync

cards.title: Added
points: Mark app as favourite while building
static file versioning to prevent update caching
Form auto-generation with CURD operations added

cards.title: Enhancements
points: New experience for app, connectors, users listing
Single login page for Creator and End user

cards.title: Added
points: Approle Mount and TLS added to Hashicorp Vault
Hashicorp wrapping secret id support added

cards.title: Enhancements
points: User-Agent set as dronahq for internal api calls to third party
